item.title: Point to Point Fiber Optic Connections
item.description:
By: John Shepler Let’s say you need a secure connection with decent bandwidth between two business sites. Should you use the internet, or is there a better option? The Benefits of Private Lines The internet has two main advantages: global reach and affordability. However, it also has two significant drawbacks: inconsistent performance and security vulnerabilities. A superior alternative is private lines, specifically dedicated point-to-point connections. These are genuinely private. Security is greatly enhanced because accessing a network you’re not connected to is incredibly difficult...
